Title: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
Description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') in highcharts.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 7.2.2, all versions starting from 8.0.0 before 8.1.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 7.2.2 before 8.0.0, all versions starting from 8.1.1
